dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2080 IH: Eastern Interior Alaska Land Use Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Alaska introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To provide that the management plan entitled Eastern Interior Proposed Resource Management Plan and Final Environmental Impact Statement shall have no force or effect.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eastern Interior Alaska Land Use Protection Act.

section.header: Nullification of effect of management plan
section.text: The management plan entitled Eastern Interior Proposed Resource Management Plan and Final Environmental Impact Statement, for which notice of availability was published in the Federal Register on July 29, 2016 (81 Fed. Reg. 50009), shall have no force or effect.
